Usage¶

Installation¶

Once you’ve Python installed simply run this in command prompt to:

cvbot.capture.get_region(region, grey=False)¶

tuple(int, int, int, int), bool -> Image Return an Image of the screen of “region” where region is a tuple(x, y, w, h) coordinates on the screen Return grey image if “grey” is True else return colored image
